name: querySapHanaSystems
description: Returns summary information for SAP HANA systems.

primary_cluster_id.description: The ID of the Rubrik cluster that provides primary protection for the SAP HANA databases.

sid.description: The SAP System Identification (SID) code for the SAP HANA system.

limit.description: Limit the number of matches returned.

offset.description: An integer that specifies a number of initial matches to ignore.

sort_by.description: The SAP HANA system attribute to use in sorting the responses.

sort_order.description: The order to sort the responses by. Valid choices are asc (ascending) and desc (descending).
